ServiceSid.description: The SID of the Service to fetch the Build resource from.

Sid.description: The SID of the Build resource to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Build resource.
**asset_versions**: The list of Asset Version resource SIDs that are included in the Build.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the Build resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the Build resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**dependencies**: A list of objects that describe the Dependencies included in the Build. Each object contains the `name` and `version` of the dependency.
**function_versions**: The list of Function Version resource SIDs that are included in the Build.
**service_sid**: The SID of the Service that the Build resource is associated with.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the Build resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Build resource.
